assignments.name: Assign_Project_Name_Not_Looked_Up
assignments.label: Assign Project Name Not Looked Up

Flow.description: WG - Added helper text to Res GPD, and other various Custom Fields feedback

formulas.name: Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points_Calculation
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Cultural Arts/Entertainment for Public"), +10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Sports/Recreation for Public"), +10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Town Electric Customer"), +20, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Expansion of existing non-residential use"), +10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Re-development of an existing property"), +5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Residential Subdivision - Additional amenities included"), + (5* (IF({!Number_of_Lots_CIDP} >= 3, 3, {!Number_of_Lots_CIDP}))),0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Job Creation - 10 to 25 new jobs"), +5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Job Creation - 26 to 100 new jobs"), +10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Job Creation - 100+ new jobs"), +15,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Job creation - Jobs created will have salaries at or above median income "), +5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Residential - Multiple-Car Garages provided"), +5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Residential - Overflow Parking provided"), +5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Masonry Elements included in Building Construction"), +10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Sustainable/High Efficiency Products and appliances used"), + (5*(IF({!Number_of_Units_CIDP} >= 3, 3, {!Number_of_Units_CIDP}))),0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Benefit_Bonus_Points}, "Private trail connection to Public Greenway"), +10,0)

formulas.name: Community_Impact_Deduct_Points_Calculation
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Pump Station Improvements required"), -10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "New Pump Station Required"), -20,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Out-of Town Status (After construction)"), -10, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Outside Fire District"), -5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Inconsistent with Comp Plan"), -5,0)

formulas.name: Development_Type_Calculation
formulas.expression: Case({!Development_Type.value}, "GOVERNMENT/PUBLIC ADMIN./PUBLIC SAFETY",50, "NON-RESIDENTIAL(COMMERCIAL) - RETAIL & RESTAURANT",30, "NON-RESIDENTIAL(COMMERCIAL) - OFFICE",20, "NON-RESIDENTIAL(COMMERCIAL) - WAREHOUSE",15, "NON-RESIDENTIAL(COMMERCIAL) - MEDICAL",25, "NON-RESIDENTIAL(COMMERCIAL) - HOTEL/MOTEL",35, "INDUSTRIAL/MANUFACTURING",30, "INSTITUTIONAL",15, "RESIDENTIAL EXISTING LOT - SINGLE FAMILY DETACHED",40, "RESIDENTIAL SUBDIVISION - SINGLE FAMILY DETACHED (>0.25 ACRE LOTS)",20, "RESIDENTIAL SUBDIVISION - SINGLE FAMILY DETACHED (<0.25 ACRE LOTS)",15, "RESIDENTIAL SUBD.-SINGLE FAMILY ATTACHED (>1,500 SF HEATED SPACE)",10, "RESIDENTIAL SUBD.-SINGLE FAMILY ATTACHED (<1,500 SF HEATED SPACE)",5, "RESIDENTIAL - MULTIFAMILY (APARTMENTS)",10, "MIXED-RESIDENTIAL",25, "MIXED-USE COMMERCIAL & RESIDENTIAL",30, "DOWNTOWN REDEVELOPMENT",30, "INFILL DEVELOPMENT",25, 0)

formulas.name: test_calculation
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Pump Station Improvements required"), -10,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "New Pump Station Required"), -20,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Out-of Town Status (After construction)"), -10, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Outside Fire District"), -5,0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Community_Impact_Deduct_Points}, "Inconsistent with Comp Plan"), -5,0)

fields.name: Total_Proposed_GPD_for_residential
fields.helpText: Please note that the Residential GPD total will not calculate unless all fields in both the "# of Units" column and the "GPD per Unit" column are populated. Use "0" if a field is not applicable.
